mnemonic:
addiction [ə'dɪkʃən]
***
ПРИСТРАСТИЕ к курению испортит тебе|дикшен.
(это) addiction
***
Твоя дикция "diction"
меняется в зависимости "addiction"
от вымысла "fiction".
examples: I discovered an addiction to housework which I had never felt before.
He devotes his summers to his surfing addiction.
She helped him fight his drug addiction.
He needed money to feed his addiction to gambling.
He had sunk to the depths of addiction.
Books are an addiction, that, when aroused in earnest, is rarely calmed.
His life has been ruined by heroin addiction.
The signs of drug addiction are familiar to most doctors.
From personal experience, she knew and understood the problems of alcohol addiction.
His addiction has turned him into a cheat and a liar.
His drug addiction had turned him into a husk of his former self.
His drug addiction has made him unemployable.
His addiction grew worse when he began mainlining.
Her drug addiction brought her to the brink of ruin.
He is trying to save his marriage by going to counseling for his drug addiction.
